sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

const OrderContext = React.createContext({
    name: "",
    email: " ",
    city: "",
    postalCode: 1,
    items: [],
    totalAmount: 0, 
    createOrder: (order) =>   { return { 
        name: "",
        email: " ",
        city: "",
        postalCode: 1,
        items: [],
        totalAmount: 0,   
    }}
})



export default OrderContext
